type Atom10FeedFormatter = class inherit SyndicationFeedFormatter interface IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 此類別可將 執行個體序列化為 Atom 1.0 格式，或自 Atom 1.0 序列化為原來的執行個體。

span.span: A class that serializes a instance to and from Atom 1.0 format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別即可序列化 的執行個體，以及從代表 Atom 1.0 摘要的 XML 文件建立 的執行個體。Use this class to serialize instances of and to create instances of from XML documents that represent Atom1.0 feeds. 若您自 衍生類別並且想要將它序列化，請使用 格式器。If you have derived a class from and want to serialize it, use the formatter. > [!NOTE] > Atom 1.0 規格允許在其任何日期建構中指定小數秒數。The Atom 1.0 specification allows for fractional seconds to be specified in any of its date constructs. 當序列化和還原序列化時，WCF 實作會忽略小數秒數。When serializing and deserializing, the WCF implementation ignores the fractional seconds. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何建立 ，並將其序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following code shows how to create a and serialize it to Atom 1.0. [!code-csharp[AtomFormatter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/atomformatter/cs/snippets.cs#0)] [!code-vb[AtomFormatter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/atomformatter/vb/snippets.vb#0)]

summary.span: 取得並設定一個值，這個值會指定序列化期間是否保留屬性延伸。

span.span: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

value.span: 指定序列化期間是否保留屬性延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 屬性延伸是指 Atom 1.0 規格中未定義的 XML 屬性。Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification. 這個屬性 (Property) 會判斷序列化期間是否寫入這些屬性 (Attribute)。This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization. 同樣地，此屬性會決定在還原序列化 Atom1.0 摘要時，`AttributeExtensions` 中的 屬性是否要保留未知的屬性。Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the instance when deserializing an Atom1.0 feed.

span.span: A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 規格中未定義的 XML 項目。Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification. 這個屬性會判斷序列化期間是否寫入這些項目。This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization. 同樣地，此屬性會決定在還原序列化 Atom1.0 摘要時，`ElementExtensions` 中的 屬性是否要保留未知的項目。Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the instance when deserializing an Atom1.0 feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不會將新建立的 執行個體新增至 ，因為這必須由方法呼叫者完成。This method does not add the newly created instances to the , because this is done by the caller of the method. 此方法為衍生自 的類別提供擴充點，以自訂 Atom 項目還原序列化的方式。This method provides an extensibility point for classes derived from to customize how the Atom entries get deserialized. 例如，衍生類別可延遲 Atom 項目的讀取，直到呼叫者存取項目為止。For instance, derived classes could delay the reading of the Atom entry until the caller accesses the entry.
